vulnerable.commit_message:
Fix Null-pointer dereference in BuildXlaCompilationCache

If ConfigProto is not used, then use the default settings which is to allow all devices.

PiperOrigin-RevId: 420391800
Change-Id: I88161ad7042990aef678e77b597a2fb2c8f815be
vulnerable.cve_desc: Tensorflow is an Open Source Machine Learning Framework. When building an XLA compilation cache, if default settings are used, TensorFlow triggers a null pointer dereference. In the default scenario, all devices are allowed, so `flr->config_proto` is `nullptr`. The fix will be included in TensorFlow 2.8.0. We will also cherrypick this commit on TensorFlow 2.7.1, TensorFlow 2.6.3, and TensorFlow 2.5.3, as these are also affected and still in supported range.
